title: Eggnog
summaries: The Eggnog is a type of recovery potion dropped from Presents obtained during the Christmas event, with a chance of 8.101% in pre-Hardmode and 7.561% in Hardmode. It heals 80 health points when consumed, making it superior to Lesser Healing Potions but inferior to Healing Potions, and inflicts the Potion Sickness debuff for 60 seconds.
Like all other food items, Eggnog can be placed on a <linked>Plate</linked>.

statistics.Sell: 8 CC
